Welcome to the  Learn Design System  docs. In this wiki, you’ll find information on each component included in the Learn Design System, together with information on colors, inputs and patterns of use. Installation Open Framer X Store and  install the…

The Learn Design System supports the  Material Design System’s icons . Below you’ll find a list of every valid icon name. You can use these names as the  icon  prop in the  Button ,  Link  and  Icon  components. Icon Name "access-point" "access-point…

An  Icon  displays a Material Design Icon. Props Prop Type Default Notes icon string "camera” A Material Design Icon name. See  Icon  below. color string colors.Primary Any color. size number 24 The size of the icon. Icon The  icon  prop can accept…

An  Image  shows an image with an optional color overlay. It may also have a  Favorite . Props Prop Type Default Notes image string null A source URL for the Image's image. overlay boolean true color string colors.Primary A color to use for the image…

A  Link  displays either text or an icon. It can be tapped and will run an  onTap  callback when tapped. Props Prop Type Default Notes text string "Get Started!” icon string ”none" The name of the icon to display (see  Icon  below). type string…
